name: admin.users.session.resetBulk
desc: Enqueues an asynchronous job to wipe all valid sessions on all devices for a given list of users

user_ids.desc: The list of up to 1,000 user IDs to wipe sessions for.

errors.cannot_reset_primary_owner: Only primary owner can reset primary owner's sessions
errors.failed_for_some_users: Some user ids failed to have their session invalidated. Details in extended comments
errors.feature_not_enabled: This method is not available for this product level
errors.internal_error: There was an internal error processing this request! Please try again.
errors.invalid_auth: The token doesn't have access to this endpoint
errors.not_an_admin: This method is only accessible by org/compliance team owners and admins
errors.session_reset_not_allowed: Only primary owner can reset primary owner's sessions
errors.unknown_method: This method is currently not available
errors.user_session_reset_failed: There was an error starting the session reset. Try again.
